description:

display action
bgm: memorize
bgm: stop
bgs: hougu_b
perform start
perform action
wait: 60
camera clamp off
motion attack: user
wait: 30
attack animation: target
camera pan: up, 3000, 60
wait: 60
face user: backward
camera pan: down, 3000, 60
wait: 60
</setup action>
<whole action>
immortal: target, true
action animation: target
action effect
wait: 15
action effect
wait: 15
action effect
wait: 15
action effect
wait: 15
action effect
wait: 15
immortal: target, false
bgs: stop
bgm: memory
wait: 60
</whole action>

</setup action>

action effect
wait: 15

wait: 60
jump user: 110%
wait for jump
</whole action>
